Module scenebuilder.editors
Package com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.editors.control.paintpicker.colorpicker

Class ColorPicker

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.VBox
com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.editors.control.paintpicker.colorpicker.ColorPicker
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class ColorPicker
extends javafx.scene.layout.VBox
Controller class for the color part of the paint editor.
